person.persName: George Viley Ward (Washington County, MS planter and horseman)

body.p: Residence: Washington County, Mississippi and Scott County, Kentucky. Born in Scott County, Kentucky, son of Junius R. Ward and Matilda Viley. Raised in Scott County, Kentucky and attended the Western Military Institute in Georgetown, Kentucky. Married Maria Williams, daughter of Minor Williams and Mary C. Viley, on September 27, 1857. A leading planter of Washington County, Mississippi and a horseman.
